column4: is anybody have that problem : enabled compiz and mplayer= movie is blinking?
yes, disable Xv video rendering to x11 in mplayer preferences
I'm using gl2, cause on full screen movie looks better
i have wide lcd-laptop screen ;/
nvidia or ati graphics?
ati ;/
its a known bug with compiz, you have to switch to x11 video output, mplayer or gstreamer-settings if you are using gstreamer-player
ok I'll test
or disable compiz effects and use the default desktop setting, thats should work too
It only works on ximage/shm, but in full-screen image is scalling and setting center... i think disabling compiz and the movie-time is the best option right?
at*
yes think thats the best option
and last question... wchich is output is better- gl or gl2?
on my system switching to the latest nvidia drivers fixed the problem...dunno if there are ati-betas available
I think there isn't betas ;/
arent*
ati and linux is still a mess
Yeah... but I think it'll change... I can't switch to my crt monitor...
It is messing my xorg...
Thanks for help ;)
yw
